title: 菊花賞の後に・溢れる

text.jpText:
『菊花賞』にてビワハヤヒデの圧倒的な力に
敗れ去ってしまったナリタタイシン。
text.enText:
Narita Taishin was defeated by 
the overwhelming power of Biwa 
Hayahide in the Kikka-sho.

text.jpText:
調整失敗の結果、敗北したことを気に病み、
心身共に疲れ切った彼女は弱音を吐き――
text.enText:
She was so anxious about her defeat as a 
result of her failed adjustment that she was 
exhausted both mentally and physically, and 
she let out a whimper.

text.jpText:
レースもトレーニングも
少し休ませてほしいと口にするのだった。
text.enText:
She asked for some time off 
from racing and training.
